title: midas89
author: midas89
created_time: January 22, 2023, 07:16:00 AMLast edit: January 26, 2023, 07:33:19 AM by midas89
content: Introducing Onikabet.com - anonymous crypto casino and sportsbook! Our platform is designed for those who value their privacy and want to enjoy the thrill of gambling without having to share personal information. We understand that many people are hesitant to share sensitive data online, and that's why we've built our platform around the use of FTN (Fast Token), the world's leading cryptocurrency.Our platform offers a wide variety of casino games and sports betting options, all of which can be played using Fast Token (FTN), Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), USDT, Tron and more. Whether you're a fan of slots, poker, blackjack, roulette or any other popular casino game, you'll find it here. In addition, we offer competitive odds and bonuses on all sports, so you can get the most out of your bets.We understand that security is of the utmost importance when it comes to online gambling. That's why our platform uses state-of-the-art encryption technology to ensure that your personal information and transaction data are kept completely confidential. Our platform is also regularly audited by third-party security experts to ensure that it is safe and secure for our users.Another advantage of using our platform is that it is completely anonymous. We do not require our users to provide any personal information, and all transactions are conducted through FTN (Fast Token), which is a decentralized and anonymous cryptocurrency developed by Softconstruct, a leading tech giant in Gaming Industry. This means that you can enjoy the thrill of gambling without having to worry about your personal information being compromised.We also offer 24/7 customer support to ensure that our users have a smooth and enjoyable experience. Our team of experts is always available to help with any questions or issues you may have. Whether you need help with a technical problem or have a question about a particular game or sports bet, we are here to help.We are constantly working to improve our platform and add new features and games. Our goal is to provide our users with the best possible gambling experience, and we are always looking for ways to make our platform more user-friendly and fun.We are also committed to responsible gambling, and we encourage our users to gamble only what they can afford to lose. We provide tools and resources to help our users stay in control of their gambling habits, and we strongly advise those who may have a gambling problem to seek help.Join us now and experience the future of online gambling with the anonymity and security of FTN (Fast Token). With our wide variety of games, competitive odds, and cutting-edge security technology, our platform is the perfect place for those who value their privacy and want to enjoy the thrill of gambling without having to share personal information.Register now: Onikabet.com

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: If you're the owner of this casino it's a bad move to introduce it by yourself as you have bad feedback coming from the community QuoteNot to be trusted, working for Pnxbet - connection with Kawbet and super-shady 1xbet/1xbitIf you have nothing to do with the casino and just want to introduce it here in the community, then clarify that you are not part of the team of owners, so the community will not think that this is affiliated with the scam casino you represent here based on your profile feedback.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Looking at OP activities, OP is not really active here and he just woke up from a long time sleep with a new thread promoting a casino and a token at the same time. This looks like one being paid to shill the casino which is far below standard and if OP is likely the owner like the first commenter has said, then it very bad of OP to have take  such a step. OP should get registered as a copper member e upload some pictures of the casino site for viewing and illustration for better publicity which would attract more participants to commenting and making reviews which would be of help to op when updating the casino.I would advise any one wanting to deal with OP should do his or her own research by conducting due diligence. Do not fall for scam.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: midas89 on January 22, 2023, 07:16:00 AMFast Token (FTN) has revolutionized the way we gamble online. It offers a safe and secure way to transfer funds, without the need for personal information or credit card details. This makes it an ideal choice for online casino players who value their privacy and security.One of the best online casinos that accept Fast Token (FTN) is Onikabet.com. It offers a wide range of games, including slots, poker, and blackjack. The casino is fully licensed and regulated, ensuring a fair and secure gaming experience for all players.Great if you want to make a thread about an online casino around a token, in this case we are talking about an FTN token, then you need to create a thread in the Service Announcements (Altcoins) board, since casinos accepting bitcoin are discussed here.Upd: OK but after looking at the casino you are talking about it is clear that they also accept bitcoin so

comments.author: ditadurapura
comments.body: Hi there,This website seems to me to be a total scam, live support ain't working, i tried to withdraw my funds almost 2 days ago, i can't even see it updating or processing at all on the website.The live chat, is just a bot that keeps asking and answering and same useless things. Don't use this website, it's pure scam.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: ditadurapura on April 08, 2023, 10:45:00 PMHi there,This website seems to me to be a total scam, live support ain't working, i tried to withdraw my funds almost 2 days ago, i can't even see it updating or processing at all on the website.The live chat, is just a bot that keeps asking and answering and same useless things. Don't use this website, it's pure scam.looking at this casino, there are no reviews on sites like trustpilot, guru.casino, askgambler, there is nothing about this casino on the internet, which makes me think that it is a casino created by a scammers who had no money to pay for advertising elsewhere and for that reason it did not manage to get many customers, so without many customers there would be no reviews from people who have used this casino, so I am not surprised that it is a scam casinoWhat I can't understand is why you stopped using casinos with a good reputation like casinos like stake.com that have been in this market for years, are very reliable, have given bonuses and many benefits to VIP members and you went to use that casino without reputation , new and to make matters worse there are not even reviews about this casino on the internet, so how did you find this casino and why did you decide to use a casino in this condition? the only thing you can do from now on is not to use shady, unreputable casinos that haven't been operating for years anymore, be very careful with new casinosthis is an already saturated market, new casinos will face a lot of difficulty to survive, so going bankrupt soon is expected, so be careful with new casinos, the creators of new casinos probably at the beginning are very hopeful that they will make a lot of money in this market , but then they face the harsh reality and the casino goes bankrupt, they take all the customers' money and run away

Don't use this website, it's pure scam.So sorry about your experience mate. I checked OP activities and to my greatest surprise OP was active last  March 18, 2023, 06:10:04 AM. This does not argur well as it shows how unreliable this casino could be. So I am not surprised at your complaints because the casino do not have good customer service care here not to talk about their website and funny enough as you have said that they do not live online support but rather a bot that keeps repeating questions and answers over and over again.If you feel you have been scammed by this casino by conviction, you can raise a scam accusation thread here with enough evidence to back up your claims.SCAM ACCUSATIONS THREADhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=83.0You are free to create a thread there for your  further resolution.

Don't use this website, it's pure scam.If it is a scam based on your experience then it's better to open an accusation in the scam section just follow the right format and upload all your evidence, this is to warn others OP is not active anymore here and I don't see him as the official representative of this casino, I would not even think of playing here checking the internet for additional information there's not much information on this casino there are a few reviews but you can easily figure out that these are paid reviews it's out of the radar of legit casino reviewers and I like to think that OP just got paid for posting it here.People should think twice about playing in an unknown casino, marketing is essential for casinos.

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: Quote from: piebeyb on April 09, 2023, 04:20:17 AMI think we all know here the OP has been flagged as fraud so I think it's clear about this site not really secure so never use it again and for your case better make a new thread on the fraud accusation board at least give a screenshot of the loss you get from this site. only giving advice that you should play gambling on a site that is active in this forum and has a good reputationYes it's true OP's friend has a negative belief for having joined a scam casino.We can conclude that the gambling platform brought by OP is also very suspicious to use because it has a very large percentage of fraud.We cannot trust anyone who has been involved in fraudulent activities because they have the opportunity to commit fraud again in the future.Maybe @ditadurapura meant to give a review here to remind that the casino promoted by OP is a scam casino that has tricked him and he wants everyone who gives feedback here to be more vigilant so they don't become the next victim.It's just that it's a shame that he didn't provide clear evidence and details of the case so we can't really fully believe it yet.Hopefully he can immediately provide evidence and share it here so that we can understand more about this fraud case.

With op trust and the feedback it's very unlikely for you to receive your money back, I doubt if op is even going to reply to this thread even if he comes across it. I don't know how you found out about this casino, might I ask which site suggested the casino to you? But you can so help prevent this type of thing from happening by creating a proper scam accusations thread that way newbies and those that haven't heard of the casino before might become aware of the activity that goes on in the casino. Btw, I'm sorry for your loss.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: sportbettor on April 15, 2023, 08:59:45 PMYou can read the review of this site (onikabet.com) here: http://sportstatist.com/onikabet-review/^Upon reading your review, this casino should be on a red flag because don't have information about its license which I think they don't. Because as I know a gambling casino that does not have a license is not considered reputable. In fact, operating a casino without a license is illegal in most jurisdictions, and it can indicate that the casino is not following proper regulation standards.I don't think this casino is reputable based on your review, (reputable software developers).

They are creating casinos tirelessly but the scam busters are also tireless.The casino looks good actually if it were just not linked to 1xbet. So it's a waste of time designing all the way to trying to promote it. Later on, it will not be surprising to see proof.

comments.author: delfastTions
comments.body: Well, how can you relate to such a casino for which an unknown new user of our forum has opened a new topic and has not written anything in this topic for 4 months at all?  I see there are two blocks of posts.  The part was written in January, when OP opened this topic.  Part written in April?  It's not clear why this topic is again one of you remembered again?  Well, apparently this is all of course some kind of stupid attempt at fraud.  Although when someone remembers that many players absolutely need anonymity in their gambling, it is clear to everyone that such casinos should be and work.  Because there are millions of players around the world who, for various reasons, need to remain anonymous.  And in some countries there are even much more of them than players who are ready to undergo KYC verification and actually lose their anonymity.

The website is easy to navigate and provides a great mobile experience, ensuring players can access their accounts wherever they go. With generous bonuses and promotions on offer, it’s no wonder why OnikaBet has become one of the most popular sportsbooks in the industry. you are ignoring the red flags that exist against them:Pnxbet --> Kawbet --> 1xbet/1xbit (known scammers) - Plz support flag!Quote from: TIMOM on April 22, 2023, 08:44:20 AMpathetic SCAM, haven't paid me $14 for a week now. funny scammers.clearly we are facing a casino scam created by a big scammer and you are ignoring such important information as this, when many people create an account and then lose money and do research on this casino, they will find your post and above your post will see accusation of a scam, so people will soon realize that your site is not reliable, that your site does not have an impartial and fair review, they will think that you are associated in some way with the casinos that you add on your site, that is the people then they thought that you are being paid by the casinos to give positive reviews about them on your websitewith that people will move away from your site and your site will be stained, it will definitely not be good for your business, I advise you not to add scam sites or sites suspected of scam or being created by scammers, ideal until you add a section on your site to put scam sites and put a warning so people don't put money in the scam casinoQuote from: delfastTions on April 22, 2023, 09:56:19 AMWell, how can you relate to such a casino for which an unknown new user of our forum has opened a new topic and has not written anything in this topic for 4 months at all? with the negative feedback that OP has on the account it was to be expected that he would not be active here on the forum, all people or at least most people can see the gravity of the accusation against OP, I'm just surprised that some people have lost money on casino created by OP, people don't do research before putting money in some casino
